item.title: The EU's strategy to eliminate human trafficking is all talk and no action.
item.description: Dr Matilde Ventrella, Senior Lecturer in Law, University of Wolverhampton (UK) 1. Introduction The European Commission recently released two important documents on October 17th: a progress report on the EU’s plan to combat human trafficking and a report on how a specific directive (Directive 2004/81) is being used to protect victims. This analysis will delve into the key findings of both reports and offer concluding observations. 2. Progress Report on the EU’s Fight Against Human Trafficking
